title: Vehicle Auto Camera
description: A Good Camera System is a necessity for any kind of Game. This plugin contains an spring arm that reacts to vehicle movements and add a feel of weight and acceleration to the vehicle
longDescription:
A good camera system is essential for any application, whether it's a game, simulation, or virtual experience. This plugin includes a dynamic spring arm that responds to vehicle movements, adding a sense of weight and acceleration to the vehicle. Additionally, it features customizable settings for camera lag and rotation, ensuring a smooth and immersive user experience. The system is designed to be easily integrated and adaptable to various types of vehicles, enhancing realism and providing users with a more engaging and interactive environment.

  • Racing Style Automatic Camera
  • Ability To Control Manually
  • Adds Reaction to acceleration and deceleration of the vehicle
  • Automatically play camera shakes when vehicle lands
  • Add feeling of weight to your camera
  • React to direction change
  • Works any kind of movement component
  • Setup within few seconds just by adding the component
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Simple
  • Efficient
  • No coding required
  • Manual Camera control with cool downs to reset

Code Modules:

  •  VehicleAutoCamera (Runtime)


Number of Blueprints:0

Network Replicated: No

Supported Target Build Platforms:Windows, Mac, Linux, IOS, Android
